data.text: Denbaya xunna ndee yi fa fala tideni Musa nun Isirayila bɔnsɔnne yɛɛratine xa keli Makiri a dii Galadi bɔnsɔnni, Manase mamandenna, Yusufu yixɛtɛne xabilane.

E yi a fala, e naxa, “Alatala to a yamari nxu kanna Musa ma a a xa kɛɛ bɔxɔne yitaxun Isirayila kaane ra masɛnsɛnna xɔn, a mɔn a yamarixi a ma nɛn a a xa nxu ngaxakedenna Selofexadi kɛɛn so a dii tɛmɛne yii.

Iki xa Isirayila bɔnsɔn gbɛtɛ xɛmɛna e futu, e kɛɛ bɔxɔn bama nɛn nxu bɔnsɔnna gbeen na, a sa e bɔnsɔn nɛnɛna bɔxɔn fari. Nayi, kɛɛ bɔxɔn naxan soxi nxu bɔnsɔnna yii masɛnsɛnna xɔn, na nde bama a ra nɛn.
Nayi, Isirayila Xɔrɔya Ɲɛɛn na a li, e kɛɛ bɔxɔn bama nɛn nxɔ bɔnsɔnna gbeen na, a sa e bɔnsɔn nɛnɛn gbeen fari.”
Musa yi Alatalaa yamarine rali Isirayila kaane ma, a naxa, “Yusufu a diine bɔnsɔnna muxune ɲɔndi.
Alatalaa yamarin ni i ra Selofexadi a dii tɛmɛne fe yi: Xɛmɛn naxan na e kɛnɛn e xa dɔxɔ na xɔn, koni a xa findi e baba bɔnsɔnna xabilan muxuna nde nan na,
alogo Isirayila kɛɛ bɔxɔne nama keli bɔnsɔn gbɛtɛ yi siga bɔnsɔn gbɛtɛ yi. Isirayila kaane birin xa e benbane bɔnsɔnna kɛɛ bɔxɔn nan sɔtɔ.
Xa ɲaxalan yo bɔxɔn sɔtɔ kɛɛn na Isirayila bɔnsɔnna nde yi, a xa dɔxɔ a baba bɔnsɔnna xabilan muxuna nde xɔn, alogo Isirayila kaane birin xa e benbane kɛɛ bɔxɔn sɔtɔ.
Isirayila kɛɛ bɔxɔne nama keli bɔnsɔn gbɛtɛ yi siga bɔnsɔn gbɛtɛ yi, Isirayila bɔnsɔnne birin kɛɛ bɔxɔne xa lu e yii.”
Selofexadi a dii tɛmɛne yi a liga alo Alatala a yamari Musa ma kii naxan yi.
Maxala nun Tirisa nun Xɔgala nun Milika nun Noha nan Selofexadi a dii tɛmɛne ra. E yi dɔxɔ e baba ngaxakedenne dii xɛmɛne xɔn.
E dɔxɔ nɛn e baba Yusufu a dii Manase bɔnsɔnna xabilane muxuna ndee xɔn. Na ma, e kɛɛ bɔxɔne yi lu e baba bɔnsɔnna xabilani.
Yamarine nun sariyane nan ne ra Alatala naxanye fala Isirayila kaane xa fata Musa ra Moyaba mɛrɛmɛrɛne yi Yurudɛn baan dɛxɔn Yeriko yɛtagi.
